title: Investigating the impact of air pollution and temperature changes on emergency admissions (cardiovascular + respiratory) disease in the city of Bojnord, northeastern Iran
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Ayoob Rastegar, Mahdi Ghorbanian, Ali Hosseinzadeh, Mohammad Hossien Saghi, Sohrab Iranpour, Ali Akbar Mohammadi, Yousef Poureshgh, Elham Rahmanzadeh, Reza Hekmatshoar, Ali Oghazyan, Mehdi Fattahi, P.U. Nguyen
